full_output.summary: As a Computer Science Engineering student, I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex problems. With a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software development, I am adept at coding in languages such as Java and Python . During my studies, I have gained practical experience through internships where I contributed to developing web applications and implementing database solutions. I am skilled in problem-solving, analytical thinking, and collaborating effectively in teams. My goal is to pursue a career where I can continuously learn and innovate in the field of software development and technology.

projects.name: Weather Forcasting
projects.description: This project is a responsive weather forecasting application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It fetches real-time weather data from a public API and displays it in an intuitive and user-friendly interface. Users can search for current weather conditions by city.

experiences.description: As an intern at ProMitra Softtech Private Limited, I gained hands-on experience in software development and project management. My responsibilities included assisting in the development of web and mobile applications, testing software for bugs, and collaborating with senior developers on various projects. I also contributed to documentation and participated in team meetings to discuss project progress and strategies. This role enhanced my technical skills and provided valuable insights into the software industry.

As an IT intern at BHEL, I supported the IT department in maintaining and upgrading computer systems and networks. My tasks included troubleshooting hardware and software issues, assisting with network management, and helping to implement security measures. I also gained experience in database management and software development. This internship provided a solid foundation in IT practices and hands-on experience with real-world applications.
